textBeforeTable: Cruise Itinerary Reviews Deck Plans Entertainment Dining Staterooms Itinerary Photo Gallery (880 reviews) / 5  3.4 View more Ports of Call: Barcelona, Spain Departing from: Norwegian Epic There are no cruises available for the requested dates. We're sorry.
textAfterTable: Highlights: A one-of-a-kind vessel offering intimate public areas, wave staterooms, and exceptional shows like the Blue Man Group. Eat when you want, with whom you want and choose from 17 different dining venues. Cool off on the water slides at the Aqua Park or sample chilled vodka at the Ice Bar. Past guests of NCL rave about the casual atmosphere, multiple dining options and fun entertainment. Your Package Includes: Your package includes shipboard accommodations, ocean transportation, fabulous entertainment and daily activities, on-board meals and some beverages. It does not include shore excursions, personal expenses, or alcoholic beverages. Government fees and taxes are not included. View more
